Nerangs.ab: tā̊scā y aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan aiβi.gərəδmahi yasnahe haptaŋhātōiš humataca hūxtaca huuarštaca aiβi.gərəδmahi aṣ̌əm vohū ēk guftan az aiβi.gərəδmahi yasnahe haptaŋhātōiš tā huuarštaca aiβi.gərəδmahi aṣ̌əm vohū ēk guftan sē bār guftan bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn

"At ... tā̊scā y they should recite three aṣ̌əm vohū (and continue with) aiβi.gərəδmahi yasnahe haptaŋhātōiš humataca hūxtaca huuarštaca aiβi.gərəδmahi aṣ̌əm vohū and he should recite one aṣ̌əm vohū. Since aiβi.gərəδmahi yasnahe haptaŋhātōiš until huuarštaca aiβi.gərəδmahi and the recitation of one aṣ̌əm vohū, he should recite it three times. He has to give bōy to the fire."
